law.history: Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 69, effective December 1, 1972. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 95, effective June 13, 1968. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 127, effective June 16, 1966. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 174, sec. 6. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1482, 1596a-8a, 1596a-10.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: State board to issue certificates of election for state and district offices -- Tie votes.
